item.title: Help with stupid thing, click 2 find out more, lol
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

win rar supports the same format…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2009, 04:56:42 pm[/size][hr]problem solved, when i used gzip 2 compress it, thanx

Read full topic

item.title: Help with stupid thing, click 2 find out more, lol
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

i added the hand cannon models.
i winrared them into 14900.gz and 14901.gz and i used the code from rune c bow. but the models keep crashing the client.

if(i == 14900) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14900; class8.anInt181 = 926; class8.anInt190 = 432; class8.anInt198 = 258; class8.anInt204 = 83; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 3; class8.anInt165 = 10083; class8.anInt200 = 10083; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Hand cannon"; class8.aByteArray178 = "omfg a handcannon".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];//Start of old colors class8.anIntArray156[0] = 5656; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//Start of new colors class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; }
item = 14900 Hand_cannon omfg a connon. 5000000 5000000 5000000 0 0 0 150 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2009, 02:42:13 pm[/size][hr]when i add the cannon with different models. i made it so that it used rune cbow drop and equip model, it works like that. but when i use the actual cannon models. it crashes.

Read full topic
